TF023663-DUTCH CTF GEORGIA SECTOR ECONOMIST,TF022150-PHRD 2-PRIVATIZATION PROGRAM
            I/CFS CONL'T,TF034303-GEORGIA - SAC (ECONOMIC MANAGEMENT)

abstracts.cdata!:
The Institution Building Project will
            assist the Georgian government in its efforts to move to a
            private market economy through strengthening public
            institutions in three functional areas: (a) financial
            sector, (b) economic management, and (c) privatization and
            enterprise reform.
